Only happens when several (around 20) lines are selected. If commenting is done
via keyboard shortcut then nothing happens. If it is done via menu then the NPE
happens.

Suspect a problem with the new partitioning code.
Created an attachment (id=5781)
fix

the newly introduced TextUtilities.getPartition() method may return null, as
opposed to the IDocument.getPartition() method being used before in its place.
Checks have been added in various places, fixing this bug and bug 41599.
Released with Tom
Available in builds > 20030815
